title: Bitcoin ETFs Have Gained $4 Billion—But Other Crypto Funds Are Waning
description: Investors are fast putting money into Bitcoin ETFs—at the expense of other types of crypto funds, a report says.

title: BTC price risks $40K breakdown as GBTC ETF steps up Bitcoin outflows
description:
Grayscale sends BTC worth an estimated $700 million to Coinbase to start the week, with BTC price action weakening.

Bitcoin (BTC) kept $40,000 retests coming at the Jan. 22 Wall Street open amid ongoing BTC sales from asset manager Grayscale.

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView confirmed new six-week lows of $40,324 on Bitstamp.

BTC price action, while mostly stable over the weekend, faced continued sell-side pressure into the new week as the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) decreased its assets under management.

Read more

title: Terra Classic delisting confirmed by Crypto.com following bankruptcy filings
description: Crypto.com confirmed the delisting of the Terra Classic token from its trading platform following Terra Labs' bankruptcy filing.

title: Reddit Reactions to Jamie Dimon’s Criticism of Bitcoin: Between Speculation and Reality
